column4: can someone please tell me how to remove ubuntu 8.04 completely and install 9.04
i'm actuallly in  live session right now
i was in the install, but the partition options didn't offer to replace the old ubuntu partition
i figured i needed to select Manual partition
just burn ubuntu 9.04 boot from the cd and when the partitioning comes activate the checkbox to format the partition and make sure u dont format the windows partition if u have one
but id din't know the commands
i have a windows partition, swap, and ubuntu
i want to replace the ubuntu 8.04 partition with 9.04
how do i get to it?
how do i get to it
i can probably format right from here
